upgrades.changelog:
Includes firmware versions: 3.0, 3.10, 3.20, 3.30, 3.40, 3.50.
* Updated parameter names and short descriptions in the Configuration Command Class.
* Added a new parameter 34: Basic Set Custom Brightness On.

Includes firmware versions: 3.0, 3.10, 3.20, 3.30, 3.40.
* Fixed the Range Test Tool feature.
* Added a new parameter 33: Convert the dimmer to a switch.

Includes firmware versions: 3.0, 3.10, 3.20, 3.30.
* Improved Direct Association Group 3 for the multilevel set functionality.
